title: Why RIOT troll good players with trollers OR how I stop carrying and start troll too :(
body:
Pls,I really WANT to know...WHY RITO troll players?Is money ALL he care?Did you EVER saw LCS game played 4 vs 5 or with some idiot that die 15 time in 10 min of game???I talk about 30 lvl players.Let you give examples from my last 2 games...YES it is ARAM,I LOVE to play ARAM ,so pls DON'T give me bullshit answer "Man,it is ARAM ,it is for fun".I KNOW it is for fun,THAT is why i love to play it but when in 100 game you have 70 with trolls and MEGA feeders whose definition of fun is "I am noob,I don't know to play so I will feed,go 1 vs 5 ALL game,build Hydra for lifesteal on Quinn,AND TONS OF OTHER BULLSHITS" it is not FUN.Or maybe i missed new meta where FUN= I am stupid r%%%%%ed kid with IQ -10 so my exuse is "I PLAY FOR FUN,GET I LIFE" and you can troll 4 people in your team cause RITO don't care?
  So,last 2 game examples:
1) Kid with more then 1000 wins on ARAM ( you would gues he know something) play Corky,go 1 vs 5 ALL game,and die 17 times in first 15 min (HOW IS THEN EVEN POSSIBLE I WOULDN'T BELIEVE IF I DIDN'T SEE IT WITH MY OWN EYES),and when i go afk cause I can't stand it no more (Should I say"THANKS RITO for this moron,THIS IS SO FUN!!!)I get warning for afk and ruining somebody game???WHAT?I am the ONE that got ruined game,BUY SOME IDIOT that should be PERMA banned...but NO,he probably wont get a report too,cause enemy team DON'T CARE,THEY HAD FUN!!! ty RITO!
2)Classic on ARAM ,I can't remember game when this don't happen...you start game 4 vs 5 cause you have AFK (TY RITO!!!! SOOO FUN!!!) ..but that is not ALL,LET PLAY 3 vs 5 cause you had OP( read brainless r%%%%%) Trynda that go 1 vs 5 like ALL game,and focus TANK ALL game( really ,EVERY time he stand in 5 enemy team ,4 squishe and only Braum TANK and he ONLY FOCUS HIM...EVERY FUKING TIME???) 
 I play LoL for years and RIOT give me some "JUST got lvl 30" IDIOT in team and think I need to think "TY RITO,THIS IS WHAT I CALL FUN"????

  I have 100s of game like this,with kids that are not noobs,THEY ARE just soooo reatarded I can't believe!!! BUT IT IS I THAT IS BAD,CAUSE I FLAME 30 lvl IDIOT THAT BUILD HYDRA ON QUINN..his reason?"I need lifesteal"...WTF ???? THIS IS 6 months after Hydra is introduced.YOU still can't read IT IS MEELE ONLY???? And i NEED to say "TY RITO,This is fun"?

 But it seems I am bad person with no life cause i cant have fun with really mentally restricted kids in my team?I NEED to be reported???Kid in my LAST game (Trynda from above) died 12 time in 10 min game (WTF???HOW????????) and he want to report ME??? Cause I went AFK ,after he die 4 time in 3:40 min,and focused TANK every fuking  time...HE IS THE ONE THAT CAN REPORT ME??? TY RITO!

  DO I NEED TO SAY TO YOU THIS: IN 99% of time ENEMY TEAM DON'T CARE,they probably honor that troll ,WHY wouldn't they ,he give them fun raping  enemy 4 vs 6 so some noob kid with 0 skill that is WORST in team can say: "easy"??? Don't ask me how many time this happen! AND after this i need to say:"THIS WAS FUN.TY RITO"???

  And you think 0,0001% of trollers you give some laughing punishment should give me some satisfaction for 100s of hours wasted by some r%%%%%ed idiots?Well,i stop carrying,NOW i troll too...let's go RANKED,and TROLL some 4 random people...just for FUN SAKE...and when they ask "WHY MAN?" i can say "I don't know,maybe just because I CAN..and RITO don't care".
